item.title: Making A YouTube Video Downloader With Python's Flask and pytube3 Libraries
item.description:
How do you download YouTube videos? The easiest answer is to google sites like y2mate that work for downloading videos. But then I thought, I wonder if I can make something?

Boredom, my curiosity and some googling turned up the pytube3 library, "A lightweight, dependency-free Python 3 library (and command-line â€¦
